page.title: 03PIANO LESSONS AT SCHOOL
page.content: Mrs.Frost, our piano teacher, comes into school to give us piano lessons twice a week. We learn in groups of mainly 4 or 5 people. In the lessons we take it in turn to play on the piano, and the rest of us play on plastic keyboards. We have our exams in Torquay. We take it in turns to go into a room and play to the examiner. We get our results in about a month from the exam. We have to get 100 or more marks to pass. Sometimes we go to Festivals, where we have to play on a stage in front of lots of people. The adjudicator chooses a winner out of the different age groups. If we win we sometimes get a cup which we have for a year but the trophies we keep. I've had some auditions at "CHETHAMS SCHOOL OF MUSIC." I heard a while ago that I shall be going there. CLARE SELBY.
